description: David Luiz has celebrated winning the Premier League by presenting the Chelsea squad, head coach Antonio Conte and owner Roman Abramovich with luxury gifts worth over £1million.
title: David Luiz buys supercar keys worth £1million for Chelsea team-mates, Antonio Conte and Roman Abramovich

author: Nasir Jabbar
description: Antonio Conte is hellbent on getting this transfer ahead of next season.
title: Chelsea Table Offer Which Includes Michy Batshuayi And £43 Million | SPORTbible

author: Ryan Sidle
description: Antonio Conte will be very pleased his former team won the Italian league.
title: Juventus' Sixth Consecutive Serie A Title Is Good News For Chelsea | SPORTbible

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Reports suggest that Inter will go all-out to bring in Radja Nainggolan, hoping it will be a bargaining chip to tempt Antonio Conte to the club.
title: Inter want Nainggolan to tempt Conte

author: FourFourTwo
description: Antonio Conte has backed Chelsea great John Terry to make the move into management.
title: Conte: Chelsea captain Terry can be a good manager

author: FourFourTwo
description: Estate agents in Italy will welcome Chelsea boss Antonio Conte's plans for his Premier League win bonus.
title: Chelsea boss Conte reveals how he will spend Premier League title bonus

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Inter are raising their salary proposal to Chelsea manager Antonio Conte to an astonishing €23m per year, according to the Sunday Express.
title: Inter offer Conte €23m wages

description: Inter are raising their salary proposal to Chelsea manager Antonio Conte to an astonishing €23m per year, according to the Sunday Express.
title: Inter offer Conte €23m wages

author: FourFourTwo
description: Antonio Conte believes a smooth transition to his tactical approach played an important role in Chelsea's Premier League triumph.
title: Defensive changes key to Chelsea success - Conte

author: FourFourTwo
description: Despite guiding Chelsea to the Premier League title, Antonio Conte thinks Arsenal are favourites to win the FA Cup.
title: Chelsea boss Conte labels Arsenal as FA Cup favourites
